title: The University of Kansas City Review

contents.note: Contents of all issues under all magazine names (full text of some pieces also available to subscribers)

additional-note: Begun in 1934 as The University Review; renamed The University of Kansas City Review in 1944; reverted to The University Review in 1963; renamed New Letters, its current name, in 1971.  Not to be confused with the University of Kansas City Law Review.
